title: NLCS: Phillies Beat Padres to Move One Win From World Series
description: Down, 4-0, after a half-inning, the Phillies’ juggernaut of an offense picked up the team’s pitching staff and ran away with yet another victory.
dc:creator: Scott Miller
media:credit: Eric Hartline/USA Today Sports, via Reuters
media:description: Philadelphia’s Rhys Hoskins drove in Kyle Schwarber with a two-run homer in the fifth inning that tied the game. Hoskins went 2 for 4 with two home runs.
